thread.title: Finally a Solution to Tangled Headphones
thread.title_full: Finally a Solution to Tangled Headphones

title: Finally a Solution to Tangled Headphones
text:
Get Business & Technology Alerts 
15 Oct 2015 08:31 AM EST 
Headphones can be a headache, from accidentally yanking the cord out of your ear or tangling the wires in your pocket. New York-based startup Alpha Audiotronics is looking to ease some of those woes with a new gadget called Skybuds, wireless earbuds that launched on Kickstarter Tuesday. Skybuds are like a Swiss army knife for all your phone needs: Wireless earbuds, hands-free calls, a battery pack smartphone case and a charging/docking station for your earbuds when you're not using them.
